item.title: Flytipping, 9th October
item.description:

item.title: On the southbound bus lane of Kilburn High Road, directly outside 234 NW6 4JP, just past the junction with Grangeway, in front of the second tree. GPS: 51°32'33.3"N, 0°11'55.4"W, 9th October
item.description:
Depth:15cm (Pothole) Width: 15-18cm (Pothole) / 130cm (Collapsing Tarmac section) Length: 60cm (Pothole) / 90cm (Collapsing Tarmac section) The tarmac section moves when buses pass on it. The issue has been reported multiple times before. The patching work done at the end of September didn't fix the cause and the pothole is already back after less than a couple of weeks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: First Mile truck has hit the bollard, 9th October
item.description:
